title: A furry asked me this today at school.
body:
Furry: "Why do humans wear shoes?"
Me: "I don't know. Probably to protect our feet."
Furry: "***I wish I was in furry form right now. Then I wouldn't have to be bare-footed***, because my special paws would protect my walking." (I think he's referring to being in a suit.)
Me: "The fuck dude?"
